name: Fluids Simulation
description:
Description

The main objective is to implement a basic fluid simulation. We will restrict the kind of simulation to one of the common ones used in video games: Gerstner waves. To make things more interesting, couple the fluid simulation with an sphere. The sphere should fall from a height and sink or float depending on its mass.

Usage

Use the GUI to toggle settings.

Technology

C++ with OpenGL
